//notes: the nylon catcher part is not technically rigid, but it's shaped enough by the metal skeleton to effectively retain its shape throughout the filling process
this used to be the replacement for the base-game `brass_catcher`
we're not positive this item remains useful, given that a universal catcher exists
besides, the dimensions seem to be way off, given that based visual analysis, the catcher cannot possibly be almost 4 times its case capacity of (2 × 100 = 200) ml
for now, the item definition remains, but the item must not spawn
//mod_targets: this version is crucially only usable on the AR-15 platform because of its unique charging handle positioning

//max_contains_volume: the average case capacity for a .223/5.56mm case seems to be ~30 gr H2O ≈ 1.95 ml
the catcher is rated for 100 casings inside
we give the capacity 5% extra on top of its (2 × 100 = 200) ml expected capacity
//max_contains_weight: the catcher is rated for 100 casings inside
the default 1 kg ought to cover it and then some
